channel.title: Blue Ridge Boost
channel.description: Recent content on Blue Ridge Boost

item.title: Afternoon Camp for 9-12 year olds
item.description: Camp at a glance When: Monday, December 27 – Friday, December 31, 2021, 2:00 am – 4:00 pm Where: 1629 Appian Way, Charlottesville, Virginia (Pantops area) Who: 9 – 12 years olds, no prior computer programming experience required What: Coding instruction using Coffee Script or Python depending on student’s experience and preference (no video games!) Cost: $350 Sign Up: nora@blueridgeboost.com Conditions to attend: proof of COVID-19 vaccination, commitment to wear a mask for the duration of the camp.

item.title: Classes
item.description: In January and February, we offer week-end enrichment classes of up to 4 students. Sign-up for as many as you like. Payment is required to reserve spot, no walk-ins accepted. Competition Math for Fourth and Fifth Graders When: To be scheduled Where: 1629 Appian Way, Charlottesville, Virginia (Pantops area). What: Problem solving strategies for elementary school math competitions, focused on MOEMS. Who: Students at fourth or fifth grade-level math. Cost: $40 for 60 minutes.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you Please contact us with for any tutoring needs in math and computing.

item.title: Instructor
item.description: Ana Nora Evans graduated from Polytechnical University of Bucharest with a degree in Computer Sience. She earned Masters degrees in Mathematics, Computer Science from the University of Virginia. She will earn a Master of Teaching debgree in secondary math education in May 2022. Nora co-funded and organized a math circle for girls ages 3 to 9 for four years. She also has four years of experience tutoring elementary students in math and coding.

item.title: Morning Camp for 6-9 year olds
item.description: Camp at a glance When: Monday, December 27 - Friday, December 31, 2021, 10:00 am – 1:00 pm Where: 1629 Appian Way, Charlottesville, Virginia (Pantops area) What: Coding instruction using block languages (no video games!) Who: 6 – 9 years olds, no prior computer programming experience required Cost: $350 (early drop off at 9am is available for an additional $50) Sign Up: nora@blueridgeboost.com Conditions to attend: proof of COVID-19 vaccination, commitment to wear a mask for the duration of the camp.

item.title: Tutoring
item.description: Math and Computer Science We offer 1-1 tutoring for students from middle school to graduate student level in Mathematics and Computer Science, both in-person and online. The cost per class is between $50 and $150 depedning on the complexity of the preparation and materials needed. For a quote and scheduling, please contact us at nora@blueridgeboost.com. Your Tutor Ana Nora Evans has a Masters degree in Mathematics from the University of Virginia, a Masters degree in Computer Science from the University of Virginia, and will complete a Masters degree in Teaching in Spring 2022.
